Property.name: Watches
Property.Description: Property is used to store watching files/globals.

Property.name: WatchesCaret
Property.Description: Watch position in file on global

Method.name: Trace
Method.Description: Chechs for correct watch source and sets watch target to ..Watches Returns status of this operation

Method.name: StopTracing
Method.Description: Removes watch from watches list Returns success status

Method.name: ListWatches
Method.Implementation: set no=0 set s = "Watching: " _ $CHAR(10) while $LISTNEXT(..Watches, no, value) { set s = s_"(pos: "_..WatchesCaret(value,0)_ "; mod: "_..WatchesCaret(value,1)_") "_value_$CHAR(10) } q s

Method.name: GetTraceGlobalModified
Method.Description: Return null string if global hadn't been updated This method watches only for tail of global and detects if global still alive

Method.name: GetTraceFileModified
CheckTracing
